name: Quantum Engineering
description:
Quantum Engineering is a factory construction game. As an employee of Quantum Engineering Incorporated, you have been deployed to a distant moon to harvest dark matter. Starting with a small collection of machinery, you will need to establish a base, expand your production facilities and defend your equipment in a harsh environment.

Automation

Everything in Quantum Engineering can be completely automated including resource harvesting, machine construction and base defense.

Logistics

Conduits, retrievers and rail carts are used to move objects from one machine to another.

Power

Solar panels, nuclear reactors and power conduits are used to power machines.


Cooling

Machines in Quantum Engineering generate heat. The more power a machine is consuming, the more heat it will produce. Heat exchangers are used to reduce this heat so the so the machine's output can be increased.



Tutorials
